name: The Dollar Game (Gino Georgiev)
description:
I recreated the game from the video from Numberphile*, it is not quite done but I made the MVP available here.

Rules:

  • Keep clicking the nodes until there are no more nodes with negative values.
  • Distribute sends 1 to all nodes connected to the node clicked and subtracts the sum from it. 
  • Collect subtracts 1 from each node connected to the node clicked and adds the sum to it.

You only need your mouse to play.
By pressing the Distribute/Collect button you change the way of interaction with the Nodes.
Pressing the settings button brings you back to the main menu.

Check out the repo on github, if you want to see how the graphs are created:
